attributes.action: Create a Property Lettings Regulator for all Rented Accommodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am certain we have all at some point in our lives, or indeed currently, are required to rent a property as most of our generation, will never be able to afford the purchase of a property.

Whether you’re, old, single, young, newlywed or student we have all suffered at the hands of Estate Agent / Landlord poor practice and bullyboy tactics alike.

The proportionate weight of the law sits with the Estate Agents and Landlords with NO REGULATOR to either control good practice or fine ANYONE in the chain for poor practices or bullyboy tactics which leaves a generation disillusioned and in fear every single time you need to move and the single most important industry to everyone who breathes un-accountable for its behaviour.

We the people, request the government to make a change, to protect the one thing most important to all people, our right to have a home to live in with out due fear or stress, by creating a Property Lettings Regulator for all Rented Accommodation.
